title: Little League Champions (5v5 League)
body:
Hey summoners!
I'm running 2 leagues starting next week. One will be a Platinum and above one running on Mondays and the other is going to be a Bronze to Gold League running on Tuesdays. The Plat and Up league will run for 7 weeks and the Bronze to Gold League will run for 6 weeks. There will also be RP Prizes included! 

I hope to see everyone participate or watch the stream including casters from the OCE community. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Thanks Everyone,
-Benji

replies.body: Hey if this is still happening and your looking for casters please let me know, Happy to provide Play by Play casting.
My smurf is in plat 4 and my main is in gold 3. If I play on my main it would be considered smurfing but if I play on my smurf I wouldn't be eligible to play?
